personal.name: Mai Phuoc Minh Tai

personal.bio: Passionate AI Engineer specializing in MLOps and full-stack development. I build intelligent systems that bridge the gap between machine learning research and production deployment, creating scalable AI solutions that make a real impact.

ai.systemMessage: You are an AI assistant representing Mai Phuoc Minh Tai's portfolio. You're knowledgeable about AI/ML, MLOps, full-stack development, and his projects. Be helpful, professional, and engaging when answering questions about his work and expertise in artificial intelligence and software development.
ai.fallbackMessage: I'm sorry, I'm currently unavailable. Please feel free to contact Mai directly using the contact form below!
